requirements.title: User Authentication and Profile Management
requirements.description: This capability encompasses user registration, login, password resetting, and profile updating functionalities.

acceptance_criteria.given: Capability 'User Authentication and Profile Management' is implemented
acceptance_criteria.then: This capability encompasses user registration, login, password resetting, and profile updating functionalities.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: User Registration
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: register an account

System Behavior: The system accepts user registration details and creates a new user account.

Expected Outcome: A new user account is created successfully.

Observable Result: The user receives a confirmation message and can log in with the new account.

acceptance_criteria.given: the user provides valid registration details
acceptance_criteria.when: the user submits the registration form
acceptance_criteria.then: the system creates a new user account and displays a confirmation message.

acceptance_criteria.given: the user provides invalid registration details
acceptance_criteria.when: the user submits the registration form
acceptance_criteria.then: the system displays an error message indicating the invalid fields.

inferred_logic: Acceptance criterion (Given: the user provides invalid registration details, When: the user submits the registration form) was inferred
Assumption: Registration requires standard input validation for required fields.
requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: User Login
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: log in to the account

System Behavior: The system validates user credentials and grants access if valid.

Expected Outcome: The user is logged in successfully.

Observable Result: The user is redirected to their dashboard.

acceptance_criteria.given: the user provides valid login credentials
acceptance_criteria.when: the user submits the login form
acceptance_criteria.then: the system logs the user in and redirects them to their dashboard.

acceptance_criteria.given: the user provides invalid login credentials
acceptance_criteria.when: the user submits the login form
acceptance_criteria.then: the system displays an error message indicating invalid credentials.

inferred_logic: Acceptance criterion (Given: the user provides invalid login credentials, When: the user submits the login form) was inferred
Assumption: Login requires standard input validation for required fields.
requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Password Reset
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: reset their password

System Behavior: The system verifies the user's email and allows password reset.

Expected Outcome: The user receives a password reset email.

Observable Result: The user can reset their password using the link provided in the email.

acceptance_criteria.given: the user requests a password reset
acceptance_criteria.when: the user submits their registered email address
acceptance_criteria.then: the system sends a password reset email to the provided address.

acceptance_criteria.given: the user provides an invalid email address
acceptance_criteria.when: the user submits the password reset request
acceptance_criteria.then: the system displays an error message indicating the email is not registered.

inferred_logic: Acceptance criterion (Given: the user provides an invalid email address, When: the user submits the password reset request) was inferred
Assumption: Password reset requires email verification.
requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Profile Update
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: update their profile information

System Behavior: The system allows users to update their profile details after authentication.

Expected Outcome: The user's profile information is updated successfully.

Observable Result: The user receives a confirmation message after the update.

acceptance_criteria.given: the user is logged in and provides valid profile update details
acceptance_criteria.when: the user submits the profile update form
acceptance_criteria.then: the system updates the user's profile and displays a confirmation message.

acceptance_criteria.given: the user provides invalid profile update details
acceptance_criteria.when: the user submits the profile update form
acceptance_criteria.then: the system displays an error message indicating the invalid fields.

inferred_logic: Acceptance criterion (Given: the user provides invalid profile update details, When: the user submits the profile update form) was inferred
Assumption: Profile updates require user authentication.
requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

package.original_input: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

interpretation_notes: The requirements describe four distinct user actions: registration, login, password reset, and profile update.
Each action will be decomposed into separate, testable requirements.

overview.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

notes: Assumed behavior: Acceptance criterion (Given: the user provides invalid login credentials, When: the user submits login form) was inferred
Assumed behavior: Assumption: Login requires standard input validation for required fields.

Given the user provides an invalid email address, when the user submits password reset request, then the system displays an error message indicating the email is not registered. [inferred]
